titles.title: Elimination of COLA for Members of Congress
A bill to reduce the rate of pay for each Member of Congress to the rate which was in effect before the cost of living adjustment in calendar year 1993.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S2039)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

bill.summary: 2/24/1993--Introduced. Reduces the salary of Members of Congress to that which was in effect before the 1993 cost-of-living adjustment.
